expected_artifact_paths.title: Expected Artifact Paths
expected_artifact_paths.description: Array of absolute paths to the Hindsight output files that should exist. All files must be present for compression to proceed.

working_directory_path.title: Working Directory Path
working_directory_path.description: Absolute path to the directory where the compressed ZIP archive will be created.

target_hostname.title: Target Hostname
target_hostname.description: Hostname of the endpoint system, used for naming the output ZIP archive.

target_browser.title: Target Browser
target_browser.description: Name of the browser that was analyzed, used for naming the output ZIP archive.

execution_timestamp.title: Execution Timestamp
execution_timestamp.description: UTC timestamp from the processing phase, used for naming the output ZIP archive.
